name: Refraction
description:
The character to which this is attached takes +1 Hydro DMG.
When the character to which this card is attached switches to another character: Elemental Dice Cost +1.
Duration (Rounds): 3
(Only one such status can be applied on the same side at a time)

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this card is attached switches to another character:</color> Elemental Dice Cost +1.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 3</color>
(Only one such status can be applied on the same side at a time)
